tables.guidance: Please provide details for every table contained within this dataset. You can add multiple tables.
tables.title: Tables

syntheticDataWebLink.description: Please provide the website address(es) with information on your synthetic dataset creation.
syntheticDataWebLink.guidance: If you have generated synthetic data based on this dataset, provide the URL here.
syntheticDataWebLink.title: Synthetic data web links

name.description: The name of a table in a dataset.
name.guidance: Enter the exact name of the table as it appears in the database (e.g., 'dbo.Patients').
name.title: Table name

description.description: A description of a table in a dataset.
description.guidance: Provide a clear, human-readable description of what information this table contains.
description.title: Table description

size.description: A Population size contributing to the table in a dataset.
size.guidance: Enter the number of rows currently in this table.
size.title: Table size

columns.description: A list of columns contained within a table in a dataset.
columns.guidance: Define every column within this table, including data types and sensitivity.
columns.title: Data columns

name.description: The name of a column in a table.
name.title: Column name

dataType.description: The data type of values in the column.
dataType.guidance: Specify the technical data type (e.g., varchar, integer, boolean).
dataType.title: Data type

description.description: A description of a column in a table.
description.guidance: Describe what this specific column represents.
description.title: Column description

sensitive.description: A True or False value, indicating if the field is sensitive or not.
sensitive.guidance: Select 'True' if this column contains PII or sensitive medical information.
sensitive.title: Sensitive

values.guidance: Optionally list specific unique values found in this column if it is categorical.
values.title: Values

name.guidance: The specific value found in the column (e.g., 'M' or 'F').
name.title: Value name

description.description: A description of a unique value in a column.
description.guidance: Description of what this value means.
description.title: Value description

frequency.description: The frequency of occurrance of a value in a column.
frequency.guidance: How many times does this value appear in the column?
frequency.title: Value frequency

structuralMetadata.description: Descriptions of all tables and data elements that can be included in the dataset.
